demo.config

Class ResponseDataControllerAdvice

  • java.lang.Object
    • demo.config.ResponseDataControllerAdvice

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class ResponseDataControllerAdvice
extends java.lang.Object
    Adds useful data into to the model for every request. This is another use of a Controller Advice (besides exception handling).
    Author:
    Paul Chapman

      • getProfiles

        @ModelAttribute(value="profiles")
public java.lang.String getProfiles()
        What profile are we currently using?

        Note that error views do not have automatically have access to the model, so they do not have access to model-attributes either.

        Returns:
        Always includes "CONTROLLER".
